hero.title: Crafting the Perfect Wood-Fired Legacy
description: Our journey began in a small corner of the city with nothing but a hand-built stone oven and a family recipe passed down through three generations. We believed that pizza was not just fast food — it was an art form.

Every morning, our master chefs arrive before dawn to start the fire using premium seasoned oak. This commitment to traditional methods ensures that every crust we serve has that signature smoky char and perfect airy texture that only a 450°C stone oven can produce.
Today, PizzaHub remains committed to those same humble beginnings: fresh dough, handmade sauce, and the warmth of a community gathered around a hearth.

heading.title: We don't just make pizza; we cultivate an experience built on three core pillars of excellence.
heading.subtitle: Values That Guide Us

items.title: Authentic Ingredients
items.description: From San Marzano tomatoes to fresh buffalo mozzarella imported weekly, we never compromise on the quality of our components.

items.title: Community First
items.description: We source our produce from local farmers and host weekly pizza-making workshops for neighborhood youth centers.

items.title: Traditional Craft
items.description: Our dough is cold-fermented for 48 hours and stretched by hand, ensuring a crust that is both light and complex in flavor.

heading.title: The passionate people behind the fire.
heading.subtitle: Meet the Visionaries

members.name: Marco Rossi
members.bio: With 25 years of experience in Naples, Marco brought his secret sourdough starter and passion for wood-fire to found PizzaHub.

members.name: Elena Valli
members.bio: Elena specializes in flavor chemistry, ensuring our unique toppings like Truffle Honey and Spicy Salami perfectly balance our crust.

members.name: David Chen
members.bio: The mind behind our ultra-fast delivery system, David ensures that your pizza arrives as hot as it was when it left the stone.
